accountInformationTabPanel message: See your account information like your location and email address.
accountTabPanel message: Access information pertaining to your account, obtain an archive containing your data, or acquaint yourself with the available choices for deactivating your account.
deleAccount info 1 message: All the data from your profile, including your posts, comments, and connections, will be deleted.
deleAccount info 2 message: You can always reactivate your account by logging in again.
deleAccount info 3 message: Any content shared with other users will not be available after the account deletion.
deleAccountModal message: Are you certain you want to delete your account? Remember, you can always reactivate it by logging in again. Reach out to culinaryalchemyofficial@gmail.com for assistance.
dietaryPreferencesTabPanel message: Welcome to our Dietary Preferences Section! Here, you can choose your dietary preferences, and our app will tailor recipes and posts to match your choices.
do you already have an account?: Do you already have an account?
name: Name
server offline message: Due to user inactivity, the server is currently offline. Please wait a few moments. Your request will activate the server, but responses may take longer than 3 minutes as we are operating on a limited budget for server resources. Once the message in the bottom right corner of the page displays a checkmark, the server is ready for testing. Thank you very much for reading. ❤️
settings default message: Here you can personalize your experience according to your preferences. Below, you will find several options to adjust your account and make this platform adapt to you.
